column5: Got out yesterday morning and this morning for some perch. Caught about 150 with about 50 keepers ranging from 8" - 11". Fish were between St. Williams and Port Rowan in about 6' of water. Unfortunatly I didn't get any pictures but I will be back out next weekend with my camera.
Nice Dan  Still having turkey or have the plans changed?lol  Were there many boats out by EC10?  Cheers  Craig
Nice haul from good ole,lake erie !!!!!!.  ..so never mind the turkey dinner,what time is the fish-fry !!!  ....lol..lol.. cheers
Nice going Dan  Thanks for sharing Leechman

Ya there were quite a few out by EC10 and it started filling up where I was by the time I left. I was going to head out there to give it a shot but I figured there was no point in leaving a good spot.  and yes the perch sat next to the turkey at the dinner table
Sounds like a great day Dan - perching has been good in the bay laterly - inner and outter !
